Package eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.predicate

Interface IBlockMatcher

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface IBlockMatcher
Used by an IBlockPattern to decide whether the placement of a block is valid.
See Also:
  • BlockPatternBuilder
ZenClass:
mods.gregtech.multiblock.IBlockMatcher

  • Field Details

    • ANY

      static final IBlockMatcher ANY
      Matches anything.

      Equivalent to function (state as IBlockWorldState) as boolean { return true; } as IBlockMatcher

    • AIR

      static final IBlockMatcher AIR
      Matches any air blocks.

    • IN_PREVIEW

      static final IBlockMatcher IN_PREVIEW
      Matches anything while inside the JEI preview.

      Equivalent to

      function (state as IBlockWorldState) as boolean { return state.getWorld().getDimension() == 2147483647; } as IBlockMatcher

  • Method Details

    • test

      boolean test(IBlockWorldState state)
      The method that is implemented when you use this as a function.
      Parameters:
      state - The IBlockWorldState to test.
      Returns:
      Whether the given state is valid for this predicate.

    • toInternal

      static Predicate<gregtech.api.multiblock.BlockWorldState> toInternal(IBlockMatcher blockMatcher)

    • toCT

      static IBlockMatcher toCT(Predicate<gregtech.api.multiblock.BlockWorldState> blockMatcher)

    • and

      @Nonnull default IBlockMatcher and(@Nonnull IBlockMatcher other)
      Get an IBlockMatcher that combines two predicates such that a block must pass both to be valid.

      Can be applied by just &.

      (matcher_a as IBlockMatcher).and(matcher_b as IBlockMatcher)

      is equivalent to

      matcher_a as IBlockMatcher & matcher_b as IBlockMatcher

      which is equivalent to

      function (state as IBlockWorldState) as boolean { return (matcher_a as IBlockMatcher).test(state) && (matcher_b as IBlockMatcher).test(state); } as IBlockMatcher

      Parameters:
      other - The other predicate, both this and other must succeed.
      Returns:
      A predicate that succeeds if both this and the other predicate succeed.

    • negate

      @Nonnull default IBlockMatcher negate()
      Get an IBlockMatcher that inverts a predicate such that blocks that fail the original pass the new one.

      Can be applied by just !.

      (matcher as IBlockMatcher).negate()

      is equivalent to

      !(matcher as IBlockMatcher)

      which is equivalent to

      function (state as IBlockWorldState) as boolean { return !(matcher as IBlockMatcher).test(state); } as IBlockMatcher

      Returns:
      A predicate that succeeds when this would fail, and fails when this would succeed.

    • or

      @Nonnull default IBlockMatcher or(@Nonnull IBlockMatcher other)
      Get an IBlockMatcher that combines two predicates such that a block may pass either to be valid.

      Can be applied by just |.

      (matcher_a as IBlockMatcher).or(matcher_b as IBlockMatcher)

      is equivalent to

      matcher_a as IBlockMatcher | matcher_b as IBlockMatcher

      which is equivalent to

      function (state as IBlockWorldState) as boolean { return (matcher_a as IBlockMatcher).test(state) || (matcher_b as IBlockMatcher).test(state); } as IBlockMatcher

      Parameters:
      other - The other predicate, either this or other may succeed.
      Returns:
      A predicate that succeeds if this or the other predicate succeeds.

    • isCenterPredicate

      static boolean isCenterPredicate(@Nonnull IBlockMatcher matcher)

    • controller

      static IBlockMatcher controller(String resourceLocation)
      Match the controller, with the given resource location.

      If there isn't exactly one of these present in an IBlockPattern, it will be considered invalid.

      Parameters:
      resourceLocation - The location, or "Meta Tile Entity ID", of the controller to match.
      Returns:
      An IBlockMatcher that matches the controller.

    • abilityPartPredicate

      static IBlockMatcher abilityPartPredicate(IMultiblockAbility... allowedAbilities)
      Match any block that has one of the given IMultiblockAbility-es.
      Parameters:
      allowedAbilities - One or multiple IMultiblockAbility-es to match for.
      Returns:
      An IBlockMatcher that matches any blocks with one of the given IMultiblockAbility-es.

    • partPredicate

      static IBlockMatcher partPredicate(String className)
      Match any meta tile entity that is an instance of the class, as defined by java.lang.Class#isAssignableFrom(java.lang.Class), given the fully qualified class name.

      If you don't know what that means, this likely isn't for you, and even then, you probably have other options.

      Parameters:
      className - A fully qualified class name.
      Returns:
      An IBlockMatcher that returns true when matching a block with a meta tile entity assignable from the given class.

    • statePredicate

      static IBlockMatcher statePredicate(crafttweaker.api.block.IBlockState... allowedStates)
      Match any of the given IBlockStates.

      When called with a single parameter, it is equivalent to IBlockState as IBlockMatcher.

      Parameters:
      allowedStates - The list of IBlockStates to match.
      Returns:
      An IBlockMatcher that returns true for any of the given blockstates.

    • blockPredicate

      static IBlockMatcher blockPredicate(crafttweaker.api.block.IBlock... blocks)
      Match any blockstate with one of the given IBlocks.

      When called with a single parameter, it is equivalent to IBlock as IBlockMatcher`

      Parameters:
      blocks - The list of IBlocks to match.
      Returns:
      An IBlockMatcher that returns true for any of the given blocks.

    • blockPredicate

      static IBlockMatcher blockPredicate(crafttweaker.api.item.IItemStack... stacks)
      Match any blockstate with one of the given IItemStacks.

      When called with a single parameter, it is equivalent to IItemStack as IBlock as IBlockMatcher`

      Parameters:
      stacks - The list of IItemStacks to match.
      Returns:
      An IBlockMatcher that returns true for any of the given blocks.

    • countMatch

      static IBlockMatcher countMatch(String key, IBlockMatcher original)
      An IBlockMatcher that counts the number of blocks that end up matching this predicate.

      This can be accessed from IPatternMatchContext.getInt(String).

      Parameters:
      key - The key whose value will be incremented when a match occurs.
      original - The IBlockMatcher to count matches for.
      Returns:
      An IBlockMatcher that returns true the same as original, but also counts the matches.
